title: why cant i look at my ranked stats anymore
body: New client beta annoys me.... cant look at my ranked stats like i used to and its always lagging. anyone know how? by stats i mean kda and how the old ranked showed you all the champs you've played and kills/deaths

replies.body:
I don't believe that's currently in the updated client, and the client devs may be looking at ways to input that.  Share your feedback and ideas with them over at the [client boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Good luck!

Btw, I was able to locate Ranked Top Champions played by selected Profile then Ranked.  Hope that helps!
